ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will fire when status picklist is in "working". This is created in custom_case object for Task dated on 10-12-2020
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if($RecordType.Name = "Record_Type_1", AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"working")), OR ( LEN( Text_Field_1__c )=0, Check_box_1__c = FALSE) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter values for Text field 1 and check box 1
